name: Bit.Bat (Global Game Jam 2017)
description:
The year is 1987, the world is dominated by a company, which monopolizes all resources, the BattleSky. In a dictatorial regime, the corporation imposes curfew, cameras in all houses and androids that are mixed among the population to watch over them.

The people are alienated and manipulated to always consume the company's products and those who refuse and rebel when they are not dead are seen slaves in the company's concentration camps.
However, hiding underground in the city of Neo Star, there is a group of hackers trained to fight the organization: The Resistance, one of the members named Kevin Bradley creates a computer virus called Bit.Bat to steal data that exposes BattleSky's flaws and so destroy it.

Game Designer: Ivo Ferreira

Game Development: Lucas Foganholi

Designer 2D & 3D: Fernando Camara
